flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour so 1 hour 20 minutes = (60+20) minutes = 75 minutes
He will spend a total of 75+10 = <<75+10=85>>85 minutes
85 minutes is = (60/60) hours and 25 minutes = 1 hour 25 minutes = 0130 in 24-hr time
He has to leave 0125 hours earlier than 0900 i.e. 0900-0125 = 0735 hours
#### 0735

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 75. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
